title: App in the Air
description:
Editors Choice ◆◆ Best of 2018 Watch app ◆◆ Featured in Forbes, Wired, CBS News, Travel+Leisure and more.

App in the Air is the single place to track your itineraries, boarding passes and manage your miles across airlines. Avoid hours of searching for the best times, price or airline with our sophisticated AI booking system that understands your flying needs and loyalties.
